title: Patch 5.5 Client Broke or something "Failed to load URL file:///role/landing/ with error (-6)."
body:
I am now getting this "Failed to load URL file:///role/landing/ with error (-6)." with nothing else. It was fine for awhile after the patch. Nothing was done. It's probably not the patch either, because I tried to force a re-patch and nothing changed.

So can someone explain this error to me at the very least?

replies.body: Do you have a screen-shot of this? I've never heard of such an error before.
